name: MIRACULOUS LADYNOIR
description: This is for the Miraculous Fandom. We will not stop shipping them or yelling at them to be together anymore. We won't stop crying our eyes out eating ice cream while watching Miraculous, thinking about how beautiful it is. We will always love our dense Adrien, our kind Marinette, our strong ALya, our chill Nino, and every other Miraculous character that we cherish and bury deep within our hearts. Miraculous Fandom unite!
additional_info: #MLB #LoveSquare #AWWWW #OMG #MyHeartIsDying *Fangirl screams echo in background* Me: *Screams, faints and dies then comes back to life to watch Miraculous again*
